asset.sources.description: Defines the asset sources available to the editor.

editor.alwaysHighlightPlaceholders.description: If true, placeholders will always be highlighted, even when not selected.

editor.blockAnimations.enabled.description: Enables or disables all block animations in the editor.

editor.borderOutlineColor.description: The color of the outline of the border of a block. This is the border of the block, not the border of the selection gizmo.

editor.clearColor.description: The background color of the editor canvas.

editor.controlGizmo.showCropHandles.description: If true, shows the crop handles when in crop mode.

editor.controlGizmo.showCropScaleHandles.description: If true, shows the crop scale handles when in crop mode.

editor.controlGizmo.showMoveHandles.description: If true, shows the move handles on the selection gizmo.

editor.controlGizmo.showResizeHandles.description: If true, shows the resize handles on the selection gizmo.

editor.controlGizmo.showRotateHandles.description: If true, shows the rotate handles on the selection gizmo.

editor.controlGizmo.showScaleHandles.description: If true, shows the scale handles on the selection gizmo.

editor.cropOverlayColor.description: The color of the overlay shown outside the crop area.

editor.doubleClickSelectionMode.description: Controls the behavior of double-clicking on a block. 'Hierarchical' selects the child block.

editor.doubleClickToCropEnabled.description: If true, double-clicking an image will enter the crop tool.

editor.errorStateColor.description: The color used to indicate an error state, for example on a text block.

editor.forceSystemEmojis.description: If true, forces the use of system emoji fonts.

editor.handleFillColor.description: The fill color of the control handles on the selection gizmo.

editor.highlightColor.description: The general highlight color used for active or selected elements..

editor.maxImageSize.description: The maximum image size in pixels that the editor will handle.

editor.mouse.enableScroll.description: Enables scrolling the canvas with the mouse.

editor.mouse.enableZoom.description: Enables zooming the canvas with the mouse wheel.

editor.page.allowCropInteraction.description: If true, allows the user to crop the page itself.

editor.page.allowMoveInteraction.description: If true, allows the user to move the page.

editor.page.allowResizeInteraction.description: If true, allows the user to resize the page.

editor.page.allowRotateInteraction.description: If true, allows the user to rotate the page.

editor.page.dimOutOfPageAreas.description: If true, the area outside the page is dimmed.

editor.page.marginFillColor.description: The fill color of the page margin area.

editor.page.marginFrameColor.description: The color of the frame around the page margin.

editor.page.moveChildrenWhenCroppingFill.description: If true, child elements are moved when the page fill is cropped.

editor.page.restrictResizeInteractionToF.description: If true, resizing the page is restricted to a fixed aspect ratio.

editor.page.title.appendPageName.description: If true, the page name is appended to the page title.

editor.page.title.color.description: The color of the page title text.

editor.page.title.separator.description: The separator used between the title and the appended page name.

editor.page.title.show.description: If true, the page title is shown.

editor.page.title.showOnSinglePage.description: If true, the page title is shown even if there is only one page.

editor.page.title.showPageTitleTemplate.description: If true, shows the page title template instead of the page name.

editor.placeholderControls.showButton.description: If true, a button is shown on placeholder controls.

editor.placeholderControls.showOverlay.description: If true, an overlay is shown on placeholder controls.

editor.progressColor.description: The color of the progress bar shown during operations.

editor.rotationSnappingGuideColor.description: The color of the snapping guides shown during rotation.

editor.showBuildVersion.description: Displays the build version of the SDK in the editor.

editor.snappingGuideColor.description: The color of the snapping guides shown during positioning.

editor.textVariableHighlightColor.description: The highlight color for text variables.

editor.touch.dragStartCanSelect.description: If true, a drag action on a touch device can start a selection.

editor.touch.pinchAction.description: The action to perform when a pinch gesture is used on a touch device.

editor.touch.rotateAction.description: The action to perform when a rotate gesture is used on a touch device.

editor.touch.singlePointPanning.description: Enables panning the canvas with a single finger on a touch device.

feature.combine.description: Enables the combine feature for blocks.

feature.delete.description: Enables the delete feature for blocks.

feature.duplicate.description: Enables the duplicate feature for blocks.

feature.group.description: Enables the group feature for blocks.

feature.position.description: Enables the position tool (bring forward, send backward, etc.).

feature.replace.description: Enables the replace feature for blocks.

feature.text.alignment.description: Enables changing the alignment of text.

feature.text.background.description: Enables adding a background color to text.

feature.text.fontSize.description: Enables changing the font size of text.

feature.text.fontStyle.description: Enables changing the font style (bold, italic) of text.

feature.text.typeface.description: Enables changing the typeface of text.

feature.trim.description: Enables the trim tool for videos.

feature.volume.description: Enables the volume control for audio and video.

i18n.locale.description: The default language for the UI. E.g., 'en' for English, 'de' for German.

i18n.translations.description: A map of language codes to translation objects. The key is the language code (e.g., 'en', 'de'), and the value is an object of translation key/value pairs.

ui.bar.canvas.description: Configures the items in the canvas bar, typically used for zoom and page controls.

order.description: The order of items in the bar.

ui.bar.dock.description: Configures the items in the dock, the main entry point for asset libraries and tools.

order.description: The order of items in the dock.

ui.bar.inspector.description: Configures the items in the inspector bar, which shows context-sensitive properties for the selected block.

order.description: The order of items in the inspector.

ui.bar.navigation.description: Configures the items in the main navigation bar.

order.description: The order of items in the bar.

ui.menu.canvas.description: Configures the items in the canvas context menu (e.g., right-click menu).

order.description: The order of items in the menu.

ui.scale.description: The UI scale factor. Can be 'normal', 'small', 'large'.
